meta.defaultDescription: Deploy and manage tokenized real-world assets in minutes. Enterprise-grade blockchain solution for bonds, deposits, equity, funds, and stablecoins.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to the Asset Tokenization Kit. Deploy and manage tokenized assets with enterprise-grade security.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor your tokenized assets, track performance, and manage your portfolio in real-time.

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Browse and manage all tokenized assets including bonds, deposits, equity, and funds.

tokenFactory.title: Token Factory
tokenFactory.description: Create new tokenized assets using our secure smart contract factory system.

onboarding.title: Get Started
onboarding.description: Complete your onboarding to start tokenizing real-world assets on the blockchain.

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.description: Securely access your asset tokenization dashboard.

signUp.title: Create Account
signUp.description: Join the future of asset tokenization. Create your account to get started.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings, security preferences, and system configuration.

socialMedia.defaultImageAlt: Asset Tokenization Kit - Tokenize Real World Assets
